thread.section_title: Le Bristol Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Incomparable
thread.title_full: Incomparable - Review of Le Bristol Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Andrew G
title: Incomparable
text: Simply the most marvellous hotel in Paris: the service is without equal (from room service, to concierge to restaurant and bar staff); the hotel is beautiful; the facilities (including swimming pool and spa) are excellent; the main restaurant, L'epicure, is sensational; the breakfast is terrific; and the manager is outstanding. It's the hotel you've always wanted. It's very expensive, but it's entitled to be.
